summary: Analyzed 1 control flow patterns; Identified 2 decision points; Found 2 parallel and 11 sequential steps; Detected 0 control flow violations; Applied UC-Methode control flow rules

steps.description: (trigger) System clock reaches set time of 7:00h (Radio clock)
The system activates the water heater
The system grinds the set amount at the set grinding degree directly into the filter
The system retrieves cup from storage container and places it under the filter
The system begins brewing coffee with the set water amount into the cup
The system adds milk to the cup
The system outputs a message to user
The system presents cup to user
Water heater has too little water

coordination_sequence: Coordinate parallel: B2a with B2b, B2c
Coordinate parallel: B2b with B2a, B2c

decision_points.condition: Water heater has too little water

parallel_coordination: GeträenkeOrchestrator coordinates WaterManager in parallel with ['B2b', 'B2c']
GeträenkeOrchestrator coordinates FilterManager in parallel with ['B2a', 'B2c']
